item.description:
Beyond The Capture

Special Program with Jane Conner-ziser
"I've never met a pixel I did not want to move around a bit"

Using digital tools to transform photography into fine art
Wednesday July 11, 2007
Holiday Inn, 1200 Beacon Street, Brookline MA

Advance registration is required.

In Beyond the Capture, Jane will demonstrate advanced retouching techniques. But, her main theme is the potential of photography beyond the capture. Learn how to retouch, enhance and ? ultimately ? move photograph into the realm of fine art.
Jane shares the techniques that have made her one of the most successful portrait photographers and retouching artists in the industry.

Portrait photographer and master retouching artist Jane Conner-ziser is a pioneer in digital imaging and evolving technologies. She has served on the Digital and Advanced Imaging Committee for the Professional Photographers of America. Considered to be one of the most talented and well rounded experts in the industry, her clients include Canon, Art Leather Manufacturing Co, Marathon Press, Kodak, many of the nations largest professional color labs, and numerous studios of fine portrait and commercial photography.

Jane Conner-ziser
Wednesday, July 11, 2007
Holiday Inn
1200 Beacon Street
Brookline, MA

Times
8:00 - 9:00 AM: Registration
9:00 AM - 5:00 PM: Program

Cost:
CIPNE members free
$75 non-members
$25 students & assistants
Advance registration is required. Sign up through this link
http://www.cipne.org/...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
